titleStmt.title: Letter: Auctioneers: Hawke's Bay Herald 31 August 1899

body.p: C. B. Hoadley & Co.â€™s sales. Preliminary notice. Important sale of Napier Hill building sites. C. B. Hoadley & Co. have received instructions from R. L. Colenso, Esq., to offer for sale by Public Auction, early in October, ALL THAT MAGNIFICENT HILL PROPERTY, Formerly the Residentiul Estate of the late Rev. W. Colenso. This Property is something over 30 acres in extent, and will be subdivided into suitable-sized Building Allotments, commanding most beautiful land and seascape views.
